column1: Little Goat Diner////I visited Little Goat for breakfast with the law school girls wanting to love it. And there's enough there to give it a second date but not love at first sight. The kimchi egg bacon pancake asian breakfast just didn't work for me. Hubby validated my opinion from the leftovers I brought home. Now my friend's crispy chicken french toast was amazing and she cleaned her plate. My other friend ... not so much with her brandade benedict
column2: which was heavy on heavy but still better than my kimchi dish.
